Texts.Eng:
A particularly elusive species, the Lombaxes are reknowned for their knack for inventions and gadgetry. Not much is known of them, but what is known is that they come in all shapes, stripes and colors.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  +^green;10^reset;% Speed, +^green;15^reset;% Jump
  Energy x^green;1.2^reset;,
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;50^reset;% Fire, +^green;20^reset;% Electric,
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Moderate Heat

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Hot biomes: +^green;7^reset;% Speed & Jump, Defense x^green;1.1^reset; and +^green;25^reset;% E. Regen

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Assault/Sniper Rifles, Grenade Launcher, Broadsword, Shortsword, Spear, Unique Weapons: Damage x^green;1.05^reset;
  Pistols, Shotgun, Broadsword, Shortsword, Spear: +^green;30^reset;% E. Regen

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Health x^red;0.75^reset;
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;30^reset;% Poison, Ice
Texts.Chs:
伦布阿克西斯是一个特别难以捉摸的物种，以其发明和小工具的诀窍而闻名。我们对它们知之甚少，但已知的是它们有各种形状、条纹和颜色。

^orange;饮食^reset;：杂食性

 ^orange;天赋^reset;：
+^green;10 ^reset;%速度，+^green;15 ^reset;%跳跃
能量x ^green;1.2 ^reset;，
 ^green;抗性^reset;：+^green;50 ^reset;%火抗，+^green;20 ^reset;%电抗，
^cyan;免疫^reset;：中等温度

^orange;环境^reset;：
炎热生物群落：+^green;7 ^reset;%速度和跳跃，防御x ^green;1.1 ^reset;和+^green;25 ^reset;%生命再生

^orange;武器^reset;：
突击/狙击步枪，榴弹发射器，长剑，短剑，矛，独特武器：伤害x ^green;1.05 ^reset;
手枪、霰弹枪、长剑、短剑、矛：+^green；30 ^reset;%生命再生

^red;弱点^reset;：
生命x ^red;0.75 ^reset;
 ^red;抗性^reset;：-^red;30 ^reset;%毒抗、冰抗
